channel.title: treemaps on R que R
channel.description: Recent content in treemaps on R que R

item.title: Data visualization: Treemaps with {treemap}, {d3treeR} and {highcharter}
item.description: This dashboard is a continuation of a previous post. In this occasion we will show how to create static treemaps using {treemap} and animated treemaps with {d3treeR} and {highcharter}.

item.title: Data visualization: Sunburst charts and Treemaps with {plotly}
item.description: This dashboard presents a few examples of Sunburst charts and Treemaps using {plotly}. They will represent the peruvian sectoral and regional productive structure in 2018.
